Make a sliding scale starting at say 20% on bonuses of$ 2000 or more, up to say 45% for bonuses over 100K and say 75% for bonuses over one million dollars. Tax all stock options at the highest value of the stock in the past 5 years so that people can't load up on tanking shares that will rebound to maybe 3X their issue value.

San Francisco- Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne says the company will run a two-minute commercial in the third quarter of the Super Bowl on Sunday, as part of the company's efforts to recast its image. Michael Vick tells NFL commissioner Roger Goodell he's not hosting Super Bowl party Michael Vick has told NFL commissioner Roger Goodell that he will not be hosting a Super Bowl XLV party. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said.
